body_content.explanation: feeling pleasure and satisfaction because you or people connected with you have done or got something good:
examples: You must be very proud of your son.
We're particularly proud of our company's environmental record.
When she received her prize I think I was the proudest parent on the face of the earth.
I'm very proud to have been involved in this project.
I was so proud (that) my son had been chosen for the national team.

body_content.explanation: having or showing respect for yourself:
examples: We Albanians are a proud people.
He might be poor but he's also proud, and he won't be pushed around by anyone.

body_content.explanation: feeling that you are better and more important than other people:
examples: Come on, admit you're wrong and don't be so proud.
She knows she's lost, but she's too proud to admit it.

body_content.explanation: sticking out from the surrounding area:
examples: Sand the surface with abrasive paper until no flakes of paint stand proud of the surface.
